articles.title: Asian Games 2023: 45 participating countries, 8 non-participant Asian countries - The Bridge
articles.description: 45 countries will be part of the 2023 Asian Games. As many as 8 countries which have their territories in Asia will not. India will be aiming for a top-5 finish this time.
